Printer as a bookend: Use the printer as a bookend to hold books and binders on your desk, freeing up valuable space.
Printer as a plant stand: Place a small potted plant on top of the printer to add a touch of greenery to your workspace.
Printer as a desk lamp: Attach a small LED light to the front of the printer to create a compact desk lamp.
Printer as a paperweight: Use the printer as a paperweight to hold down papers on your desk.
Printer as a paper holder: Attach a small tray to the side of the printer to hold loose papers and notes.
